Description:
Monochroma - platform arcade from studio Nowhere Studios. Events unfold will alternate past in 1950. 
The very same story will show us the story of two brothers who want to save their hometown from 
the evil corporation that develops and sells robots. For the passage of different levels, you will need 
to solve puzzles based on physics and logic.
